body:
i'm thankful for [fragments of virginia woolf](https://twitter.com/the__waves/status/940431015847256064).

i'm thankful for [maggie nelson](https://twitter.com/durgapolashi/status/940576164573335552).

i'm thankful for a nice conversation i had with a teammate yesterday about our differing philosophical approaches to our work.

i'm

i'm thankful for [haimukkah](http://www.mtv.com/news/3052764/haim-hanukkah-song/?xrs=_s.tw_news).\_\_\_PARAGRAPH\_BREAK\_\_\_

i'm thankful for [the opening chords](https://twitter.com/RuthCurry/status/940737159560155137) of "[sometimes.](https://open.spotify.com/track/5KBKqxYY263Tr0haAu3fMz)"

i'm thankful for the slippers d gave me as an early xmas present, which keep my feet warm.

i'm thankful for the ghost rose candle i gave her, which perfumes the air.

i'm thankful for [this article about crackers](https://www.eater.com/2017/12/12/16757660/doomsday-biscuit-all-purpose-survival-cracker) designed to feed people after nuclear war.

i'm thankful for [this review of the use of food](http://www.usgamer.net/articles/food-in-games-feature-battle-chef-brigade-overcooked-consume-me) in recent video games.

i'm thankful that my parents are having a nice time in new zealand.

i'm thankful [we can instantly communicate](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/939634697558257664) across the ocean.

i'm thankful for [moth humor](https://twitter.com/egabbert/status/941025273624928256).

i'm thankful for [this recut](https://twitter.com/yoyorobot/status/939547552646438912) of the _call me by your name_ trailer with images from _monsters university_.

i'm thankful for our dinner salads this week, i have been making a simple but actual dressing.

i'm thankful for red wine vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt, and olive oil, emulsified with a fork in a mug.

i'm thankful for [this mutation of harry potter](http://botnik.org/content/harry-potter.html).

i'm thankful for [this game of shifting pictures](https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2017/12/12/gorogoa-review/#more-499435).
